grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 離【リ】li (one of the trigrams of the I Ching: fire, south)
離宮【リキュウ】imperial villa, royal villa, detached palace
短距離【タンキョリ】short distance, short range, short-haul
近距離【キンキョリ】short distance
kun reading compounds: 離れる【はなれる】to be separated, to be apart, to be distant, to leave, to go away, to leave (a job, etc.), to quit, to give up, to lose connection with, to drift away from
離す【はなす】to separate, to part, to divide, to keep apart
